description: Lists jobs. Requires permission to access the ListJobs action.

parameters.name: targetSelection
parameters.description: Specifies whether the job will continue to run (CONTINUOUS), or will be complete after all those things specified as targets have completed the job (SNAPSHOT). If continuous, the job may also be run on a thing when a change is detected in a target. For example, a job will run on a thing when the thing is added to a target group, even after the job was completed by all things originally in the group.

parameters.name: namespaceId
parameters.description: The namespace used to indicate that a job is a customer-managed job. When you specify a value for this parameter, Amazon Web Services IoT Core sends jobs notifications to MQTT topics that contain the value in the following format. $aws/things/THING_NAME/jobs/JOB_ID/notify-namespace-NAMESPACE_ID/

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: thingGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the thing group.

nested_items.name: targetSelection
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the job will continue to run (CONTINUOUS), or will be complete after all those things specified as targets have completed the job (SNAPSHOT). If continuous, the job may also be run on a thing when a change is detected in a target. For example, a job will run on a thing when the thing is added to a target group, even after the job was completed by all things originally in the group.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job was last updated.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job completed.

nested_items.name: isConcurrent
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a job is concurrent. Will be true when a job is rolling out new job executions or canceling previously created executions, otherwise false.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
